# Paso 2

## Instrucciones 1 a 6

```{r warning=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(flextable)

df_mini_iris <- read_csv(file = "mini_iris.csv")
df_mini_iris

df_exibble <- read_csv(file = "datos_para_tabla.csv")
df_exibble <- df_exibble %>% select(-c(8,9))
df_exibble

kbl(df_mini_iris)

df_mini_iris %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_styling()
```
```{r warning=FALSE}
df_mini_iris %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_paper("hover", full_width=F)
```
```{r warning=FALSE}
df_mini_iris %>%
  kbl (caption = "Tabla mini iris") %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 16)
```
```{r warning=FALSE}
df_exibble %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kable_paper("hover", full_width=F)
```
```{r warning=FALSE}
df_exibble%>%
  kbl(caption = "Tabla exibble") %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 16)
```

# Paso 3

```{r warning=FALSE}
library(formattable)

df_exibble %>%
  gt()  %>%
  fmt_number(
    columns = 7,
    decimals = 1
  ) %>%
  fmt_currency(
    columns = 7,
    currency = "USD"
  )

```

# Paso 4

```{r warning=FALSE}
library(flextable)
df_mini_iris <- read_csv(file = "mini_iris.csv")
df_mini_iris

ft <- flextable(df_mini_iris)

set_flextable_defaults(
  font.size = 10, theme_fun = theme_vanilla,
  padding = 6,
  background.color = "#EFEFEF"
)
flextable(df_mini_iris)

```

```{r warning=FALSE}
myft<- flextable(head(df_exibble),
                 col_keys = c("num", "chart", "fctr", "date", "time"))
myft
```
